
Changelog
=========

master
------

0.2.2 (2018-02-01)
------------------

* Shows warning rather than giving exception when using greenthread singletons without a greenthread environment

------------------

* CI changes

0.2.0 (2018-01-23)
------------------

* More tests
* Usage examples added to documentation
* Fixed issues revealed by tests

0.1.0 (2018-01-22)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.
